channel.title: Dpkg: error: dpkg status database is locked by another process
channel.description:
dpkg: error: dpkg status database is locked by another process E: Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code (2)
Got this error after "sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade". I repeat command again and it seems finished update without errors. How to make sure that everything is good ?

item.title: Dpkg: error: dpkg status database is locked by another process
item.dc:creator: punk
item.source: Dpkg: error: dpkg status database is locked by another process

item.title: Dpkg: error: dpkg status database is locked by another process
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
No error messages = good.

Check the exit code.

sudo apt-get update
echo $?

sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
echo $?

0 = good.

Read full topic
item.source: Dpkg: error: dpkg status database is locked by another process
